div.p: Unpublished work by Schenker, written between 1905 and c. 1909, its full provisional title being "Über den Niedergang der Kompositionskunst: eine technisch-kritische Untersuchung" ("The Decline of the Art of the Art of Composition: A Technical-Critical Study").

div.head: History of the Project
div.p: The Niedergang began life in 1905–06 as the "Nachwort" (Afterword) to Schenker's Harmonielehre (1906). However, it increased so greatly that it became an independent piece of writing at first destined to be released by Easter 1907, later envisioned as volume III of Neue Musikalische Theorien und Phantasien. The work was never published in its own right, and survives as an edited typescript, OC 31/28–153. The overall production of the work lay between 1905 and c. 1909.
